scripts.check: pnpm run -r --parallel --filter=!rakkas-demo-js --filter=!rakkas-demo-ts check && pnpm run check --filter=rakkas-demo-ts && pnpm run check --filter=rakkas-demo-js
scripts.canary: pnpm -r exec -- npm version --no-git-tag-version prerelease --preid=canary && pnpm -r --filter=./packages exec -- pnpm publish --tag canary --no-git-checks --access=public
scripts.publish: pnpm -r exec -- pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r --filter=./packages exec -- pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access=public
